section.p: You awake, coughing and spluttering. You have come back to life in one of Argon’s life-vats on the top of Sky Mountain.

The possessions and cash that you were carrying at the time of your death are lost. Cross them off your Adventure Sheet. Your Stamina is back to full, though. Also remember to delete the entry in the Resurrection box now that it has been used.
‘Run into some trouble did we?’ Argon asks as he helps you out of the vat.
